definition: to sleep soundly/(fig.) to rest easy/to be free of worries
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
pillow/to pillow/to rest one's head on (Taiwan pr. [zhen4] for this sense)

sentences.english: Fear can keep us up all night long, but faith makes one fine pillow.
sentences.chinese: 恐懼令人徹夜難眠，信心卻可教人安枕。

definition: the still of the night (idiom)/late at night
hundred knots of worry in one's intestines (idiom); weighed down with anxiety
thoughts surging in one's mind (idiom)/different thoughts coming to mind
lit. to live and sleep together (idiom); fig. a close friendship
to ponder a solution/to consider (the best move, how to find a way etc)
